project.name: distrib
project.description: Kura is a Java/OSGI-based framework for IoT gateways. Kura APIs offer access to the underlying hardware (serial ports, GPS, watchdog, GPIOs, I2C, etc.), management of network configurations, communications with M2M/IoT Integration Platforms, and gateway management.

properties.project.raspbian.dependencies: hostapd, isc-dhcp-server, iw, bluez-hcidump, dos2unix, bind9, unzip, ethtool, telnet, wireless-tools
